definition: sour/tart/sick at heart/grieved/sore/aching/pedantic/impractical/to make sarcastic remarks about sb/an acid

sentences.english: Ammonium sulfate is against potassium sulfite pulping of rice straw.
sentences.chinese: 硫酸銨對稻草亞硫酸鉀蒸煮有不利影響。

sentences.english: The process of synthesizing potassium sulfate with methanol solution sulfate-ammonium method was studied.
sentences.chinese: 對甲醇溶液硫銨法制取硫酸鉀工藝進行了研究。

sentences.english: To apply potassium sulfate in the middle and late periods can increase the quality and production of lychee.
sentences.chinese: 中後期施用硫酸鉀能提高荔枝的品質和產量。

sentences.english: Potassium sulfate accelerate the speed of the reaction, thus it reduce the setting time.
sentences.chinese: 硫酸鉀能加速凝固反應速率，縮短凝固時間。

sentences.english: The new technology and developed technology's situation of producting potassium sulfate in our country are described.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了我國硫酸鉀生產新工藝和工藝改進研究情況。

sentences.english: The process of synthesis potassium sulfate by phosphogypsum double salt method was studied and improved.
sentences.chinese: 對磷石膏複鹽法制備硫酸鉀工藝進行了研究和改進。

sentences.english: The available K in tea-growing soils was markedly increased by K2S04 fertilizer.
sentences.chinese: 施用硫酸鉀能明顯增加茶園土壤中的速效硫含量。
